entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT, Sarnia
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 4:17 p.m. EDT Monday 3 April 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Light Rain, 13.3Â°C

entry.title: Monday night: Periods of rain. Low plus 5.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Periods of rain beginning this evening. Amount 10 to 15 mm. Wind southwest 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming light early this evening. Low plus 5. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EDT Monday 3 April 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Periods of rain. High 10.
